title: Reported for scripting when I wasn't.
body:
Hello, I'm sure that I don't have anything to worry about but just in case I'm coming here. 

I'm in Bronze 1/Silver V elo currently and lately I've really stepped up my kiting and positioning mechanics having identified them as major weaknesses of mine about a year ago. However I've had multiple people chastise me for supposedly scripting now recently for how much I've been able to improve it in recent months. I shouldn't need to be worried about a ban just because multiple people are reporting me for this same thing should I? If it were just one or two people I wouldn't be so nervous but it's not. People are starting to cite my match history as proof of my supposed scripting but it's just not true...

I'm willing to subject myself to some kind of spectated game or something if need be, it's just that I've sunk several hundred dollars into this game to unlock various skins and champions and I'd hate to lose out on that investment over some stupid false claims. Maybe I'm just paranoid but I always fear getting punished for crimes I've never committed, one of those irrational fears I guess.

Thank you in advance! :D

replies.body:
No worries! Even if people are reporting you for scripting, those types of things need to be detected before they get actioned on I'm pretty sure. If you aren't really using any third party programs, you've got nothing to worry about other than haters!

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zP4dzB0n,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-06T21:29:35.091+0000)
>
> No worries! Even if people are reporting you for scripting, those types of things need to be detected before they get actioned on I'm pretty sure. If you aren't really using any third party programs, you've got nothing to worry about other than haters!
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

Awesome, that's what I was figuring but I thought I might reach out anyway just to be safe. Thank you for your reply! :D
